titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to allow the duty-free entry of an additional quantity of green peanuts that are the product of Mexico.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/17/1997--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to allow the duty-free entry, from January 1 through April 30, of an additional quantity of Mexican immature (green) peanuts (to be marketed for consumption as boiled peanuts).
